additionalFields.description:

parameters.subject: =Welcome to AiGS! Your Onboarding Information - {{ $('Initialize Onboarding Data').item.json.full_name }}
parameters.message:
=

Welcome to AiGS, {{ $('Initialize Onboarding Data').item.json.first_name }}!

We're thrilled to have you joining the team on {{ $('Initialize Onboarding Data').item.json.start_date }}.

Your Account Credentials

  • Corporate Email: {{ $('Initialize Onboarding Data').item.json.corporate_email }}
  • Temporary Password: {{ $('Initialize Onboarding Data').item.json.temp_password }}
  • Slack: {{ $('Initialize Onboarding Data').item.json.slack_username }}

Please change your password upon first login.

Day 1 Schedule

  • 9:00 AM - Welcome & Orientation
  • 1:00 PM - IT Setup & Security Training
  • 4:00 PM - 1:1 with {{ $('Initialize Onboarding Data').item.json.manager_name }}

Calendar invites have been sent for all scheduled sessions.

Your manager, {{ $('Initialize Onboarding Data').item.json.manager_name }}, and the IT team have been notified and are preparing for your arrival.

If you have any questions before your start date, please don't hesitate to reach out!

Best regards,
AiGS HR Team

Onboarding ID: {{ $('Initialize Onboarding Data').item.json.onboarding_id }}

parameters.content:
## Employee Onboarding Orchestrator
### AiGS Demo - Complete Version

**REAL Integrations:**
 Slack - Creates channel, posts messages, notifies teams
 Google Calendar - Creates actual events
 Gmail - Sends welcome email to new hire
 Google Sheets - Real-time status tracking

**SIMULATED (with delays):**
 Google Workspace account creation
 Jira account creation

**TO CONFIGURE:**
1. Replace YOUR_STATUS_SHEET_ID with your Google Sheet ID
2. Add your Slack credentials and channel IDs
3. Add your Google Calendar credentials
4. Add your Gmail credentials
5. Optionally add Notion integration

name: Employee Onboarding Orchestrator Full - AiGS Demo
